articles.title: Russia’s main economic lifeline faces a potent new threat - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Europeans have finally agreed to a ban on imports of seaborne Russian oil. That wasn’t, however, the most damaging sanction agreed to this week.

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Russia Ukraine Crisis | EU leaders agree on Russian oil ban by end-2022. Here’s what they said on... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: European Union leaders have agreed to ban more than two-thirds of Russian oil imports, tightening economic screws on the country even as Moscow's forces press their offensive in Ukraine's eastern Donbas region.
